original: de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis khyod gsung kun dang 'tsham par 'jug pa'i dbye ba brgyad pa bshad do //
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis khyod gsung kun dang 'tsham par 'jug pa'i dbye ba brgyad pa bshad do //
translated: This verse explains the eighth division of speech, which is appropriate to all of the Buddha's speech.

original: gzhan yang / mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed //🔽bar ma rnams kyi blo yang spel //
analyzed: gzhan yang / mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed // bar ma rnams kyi blo yang spel //
translated: Moreover, it delights the wise,🔽it increases the understanding of the middling,

original: tha ma'i rab rib rnam 'joms pas //
analyzed: tha ma'i rab rib rnam 'joms pas //
translated: and it destroys the darkness of the lowest.

original: gsung 'di skye bo kun la sman //
analyzed: gsung 'di skye bo kun la sman //
translated: Thus this speech is medicine for all beings.

original: mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed //
translated: It delights the wise,

original: ces bya ba ni rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rgyas pa'o //
translated: this is the extensive explanation.

original: mkhas pa ni dbang po rnon po rnams kyi ste /
analyzed: mkhas pa ni dbang po rnon po rnams kyi ste /
translated: The wise are those of sharp faculties.

original: dga' ba ni yid bde ba bskyed pas na dga' ba bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: dga' ba ni yid bde ba bskyed pas na dga' ba bskyed pa ste /
translated: Delight is the generation of mental pleasure, because it generates delight.

original: bton pa tsam gyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bton pa tsam gyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is understood merely by being uttered.

original: gsung zhes bya ba ni 'chad @150a * //🔽par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gsung zhes bya ba ni 'chad @150a * //🔽par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Speech is as will be explained.

original: dper na sngon chu srin las lha'i bur gyur pa de nyid kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin mthong nas tshong pas khe rnyed pa dang 'dra bar yid bde ba thob pas 'gro bar gyur to zhes rgyas par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na sngon chu srin las lha'i bur gyur pa de nyid kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin mthong nas tshong pas khe rnyed pa dang 'dra bar yid bde ba thob pas 'gro bar gyur to zhes rgyas par gsungs pa'o //
translated: For example, it is like the son of a god who was formerly a sea monster. He was delighted to see the nature of the truth, and he went to the merchants who had gained their profit.

original: bar ma rnams ni dbang po par ma rnams kyi thos pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis shes rab nye bar bsdus pa'i phyir blo spel bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: bar ma rnams ni dbang po par ma rnams kyi thos pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis shes rab nye bar bsdus pa'i phyir blo spel bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: The middle ones are those who have increased their intelligence by the practice of hearing, reflection, etc., and by the wisdom which is the nature of meditation.

original: tha ma ni dbang po dman pa rnams kyis mi shes pa'i rab rib 'joms pas na rab rib 'joms pa ste /
analyzed: tha ma ni dbang po dman pa rnams kyis mi shes pa'i rab rib 'joms pas na rab rib 'joms pa ste /
translated: The last ones are those who have destroyed the cataract of ignorance, because they have destroyed the cataract of ignorance.

original: las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa nges par bskyed par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa nges par bskyed par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they have generated the certainty of the relation between action and result.

original: de bas na dbang po rnon po dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i skye bo la sman pas na skye bo kun la sman pa ste gsung de nyid bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na dbang po rnon po dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i skye bo la sman pas na skye bo kun la sman pa ste gsung de nyid bshad pa'o //
translated: Therefore, because it is the medicine for all beings, for those of sharp, middle, and last faculties, it is the medicine for all beings.

original: de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsung ni skye bo kun la sman pa ste dbye ba dgu pa bshad do //
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsung ni skye bo kun la sman pa ste dbye ba dgu pa bshad do //
translated: This verse explains the ninth variety of speech, which is medicine for all people.🔽Again:

original: slar yang / lta ba dag las dgar mdzad cing //
analyzed: slar yang / lta ba dag las dgar mdzad cing //
translated: It delights in the right views,

original: mya ngan 'das pa nye bar 'dren //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa nye bar 'dren //
translated: and leads to nirvana.

original: nyes pa sel mdzad khyod kyi gsung //
analyzed: nyes pa sel mdzad khyod kyi gsung //
translated: Your speech, O Destroyer of Faults,

original: yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'bebs //
analyzed: yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'bebs //
translated: rains down virtues.

original: lta ba dag las dgar mdzad cing //🔽zhes smos pa la /
analyzed: lta ba dag las dgar mdzad cing // zhes smos pa la /
translated: It delights in the right views.🔽It delights in the right views means it delights in the right views.

original: dga' bar mdzad pa ni ring du mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: dga' bar mdzad pa ni ring du mdzad pa'o //
translated: It delights means it acts for a long time.

original: gsung zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsung zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Speech will be explained.

original: lta ba dag ni 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin pa la sogs pa dag las te /
analyzed: lta ba dag ni 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin pa la sogs pa dag las te /
translated: In the right views means in the right views of the aggregates, the extremes, and so on.

original: nyon mongs pa zad par mdzad pa bstan pas mthong ba'i lam 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa zad par mdzad pa bstan pas mthong ba'i lam 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said to lead to nirvana because the path of insight arises through the teaching of the exhaustion of the addictions.

original: mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'dren zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa zad par mdzad pa bstan pa nyid kyis bsgom pa'i lam bskyed pa'i phyir phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'dren par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'dren zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa zad par mdzad pa bstan pa nyid kyis bsgom pa'i lam bskyed pa'i phyir phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'dren par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to
translated: The phrase leads to nirvana means that by teaching the elimination of afflictions, he leads to nirvana with remainder, because he generates the path of cultivation.

original: // nyes pa sel mdzad ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa spang ba bstan pa nyid kyis mi slob pa'i lam bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: // nyes pa sel mdzad ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa spang ba bstan pa nyid kyis mi slob pa'i lam bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase removes faults means that by teaching the elimination of afflictions, he generates the path of no learning.

original: nyes pa ni khams gsum pa'i ma lus par sel bar mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: nyes pa ni khams gsum pa'i ma lus par sel bar mdzad pa ste /
translated: He removes all faults of the three realms.

original: rab tu sel bar mdzad pa ni rab tu sel bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu sel bar mdzad pa ni rab tu sel bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: He removes means he removes them.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mdzad pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa dang / smon lam gyi ye shes la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'babs te /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mdzad pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa dang / smon lam gyi ye shes la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'babs te /
translated: The rain of the qualities of the wisdom of the absence of afflictions, prayers, and so on falls upon him, because he generates the path of no learning and because he teaches in order to generate it.

original: de bskyed pa'i phyir bstan par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bskyed pa'i phyir bstan par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He generates means he generates it.

original: de la bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsung mthong ba dang / bsgom pa dang / mi slob @150b pa'i lam dang mthun pa ste dbye ba bcu pa bshad do //
analyzed: de la bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsung mthong ba dang / bsgom pa dang / mi slob @150b pa'i lam dang mthun pa ste dbye ba bcu pa bshad do //
translated: The verse on the son explains the tenth division, which is consistent with the paths of seeing, cultivation, and the adept.

original: dran pa dang blo dag thogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir drang srong rgyas pa la sogs pa'i tshig ni brdzun pa yin te /🔽bcom ldan 'das ni /
analyzed: dran pa dang blo dag thogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir drang srong rgyas pa la sogs pa'i tshig ni brdzun pa yin te / bcom ldan 'das ni /
translated: The words of the sages, such as Vṛhaspati, are false, because memory and understanding are obstructed.🔽The Lord

original: kun la ma thogs thugs mnga' zhing //
analyzed: kun la ma thogs thugs mnga' zhing //
translated: has a mind that is unobstructed with regard to all things,

original: zhes bya ba rgyas par bshad par bya ste /🔽kun la ma thogs thugs mnga' zhing //
analyzed: zhes bya ba rgyas par bshad par bya ste / kun la ma thogs thugs mnga' zhing //
translated: as will be explained in detail.🔽He has a mind that is unobstructed with regard to all things,

original: dgongs pa'ang kun nas nyer gnas pas //
analyzed: dgongs pa'ang kun nas nyer gnas pas //
translated: and his intention is always present.

original: de slad khyod kyis lung bstan kun //
analyzed: de slad khyod kyis lung bstan kun //
translated: Therefore, all of your predictions

original: thams cad la yang slu mi mnga' //
analyzed: thams cad la yang slu mi mnga' //
translated: are never deceptive with regard to anything.

original: kun ni shes bya rnams la ste thogs pa mi mnga' ba ni thogs pa mi mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: kun ni shes bya rnams la ste thogs pa mi mnga' ba ni thogs pa mi mnga' ba'o //
translated: “All things” refers to objects of knowledge. “Unimpeded” means unobstructed.

original: thugs ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: thugs ni shes rab ste /
translated: “Mind” refers to wisdom.

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang nyon mongs pa ma yin pa'i mi shes pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang nyon mongs pa ma yin pa'i mi shes pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the abandonment of the obscuration that consists in the afflictive states and of the non-cognisance that is neither the obscuration that consists in the afflictive states nor the knowable.

original: khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: You is to be supplied.

original: kun du zhes bya ba ni shes bya nyid la ste /🔽nye bar gnas pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: kun du zhes bya ba ni shes bya nyid la ste / nye bar gnas pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: In every way refers to the knowable.🔽Abides refers to meditative equipoise.

original: dgongs pa ni yul la 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ni yul la 'dod pa'o //
translated: Intention refers to the wish for an object.

original: slu ba ni 'bras bu med pa bshad pa'o //
analyzed: slu ba ni 'bras bu med pa bshad pa'o //
translated: Deception refers to the explanation of the non-existent result.

original: slu ba mi mnga' ba ni mi slu ba ste 'bras bu dang bcas pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: slu ba mi mnga' ba ni mi slu ba ste 'bras bu dang bcas pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: Non-deception refers to the non-deceptive, i.e. the existent result, this is the intended meaning.

original: de slad ces bya ba ni rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de slad ces bya ba ni rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore refers to the cause.

original: kun la thugs dang dgongs pa dag mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir khyod kyis lung bstan pa kun ni gdams ngag ste /
analyzed: kun la thugs dang dgongs pa dag mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir khyod kyis lung bstan pa kun ni gdams ngag ste /
translated: All your predictions are instructions because your mind and intention are in meditative equipoise in regard to all things.

original: slu ba mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: slu ba mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of non-deceptive is to be supplied.

original: 'di'i phyir yang mi slu ba ste /
analyzed: 'di'i phyir yang mi slu ba ste /
translated: For this reason also it is non-deceptive.

original: gang slad yul min dus min dang // snod min rnams su mi 'jug pa //
analyzed: gang slad yul min dus min dang // snod min rnams su mi 'jug pa //
translated: Because it does not engage in regard to a non-object, a non-time and a non-recipient.

original: de slad khyod gsung don mchis te //
analyzed: de slad khyod gsung don mchis te //
translated: Therefore, your speech is meaningful.

original: brtson 'grus legs par brtsams pa bzhin //
analyzed: brtson 'grus legs par brtsams pa bzhin //
translated: As you have well begun your effort,

original: gang slad yul min dus min dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /🔽gang slad ces bya ba ni gang gi phyir ro //
analyzed: gang slad yul min dus min dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la / gang slad ces bya ba ni gang gi phyir ro //
translated: “Not in the place, not in the time, etc.”

original: yul min ni yul kho na la rab tu 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: yul min ni yul kho na la rab tu 'jug pa ste /
translated: “Not in the place” means that you do not enter into the place itself.

original: gdul bya'i dgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdul bya'i dgos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For the sake of the needs of those to be trained.

original: 'di ltar cho 'phrul chen po ston par bzhed pas rgyal po'i khab nas mnyan yod du gshegs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar cho 'phrul chen po ston par bzhed pas rgyal po'i khab nas mnyan yod du gshegs so //
translated: Thus, intending to display a great miracle, you went from Rājagṛha to Śrāvastī.

original: gang gi phyir dus min pa ni dus kho na la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dus min pa ni dus kho na la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: “Not in the time” means that you do not enter into the time itself.

original: ji ltar yun ring por bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen po ston par mdzad pa zhes bya ba rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dris pas zhag bdun 'das pa na zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar yun ring por bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen po ston par mdzad pa zhes bya ba rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dris pas zhag bdun 'das pa na zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: As it is said, “When King Prasenajit asked, ‘Why has the Blessed One displayed a great miracle for such a long time?’ it was said, ‘After seven days.’

original: dus de tsam gyis gdul ba'i rgyud des yongs su smin par gzigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus de tsam gyis gdul ba'i rgyud des yongs su smin par gzigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ” Because he saw that the continuum of the one to be trained would be fully ripened by that much time.

original: gang gi phyir snod min ni rdzogs byed la sogs pa snod ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir snod min ni rdzogs byed la sogs pa snod ma yin pa'o //
translated: The unfit vessel is one who is not a vessel for the perfection of generosity, etc.

original: snod ni thar pa'i sa bon dang ldan pa'i @151a * //
analyzed: snod ni thar pa'i sa bon dang ldan pa'i @151a * //
translated: The fit vessel is one who is a vessel for the seed of liberation.

original: snod kho na 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: snod kho na 'jug pa'o //
translated: He is the one who enters.

original: de slad ni rgyu des don mchis pa ste khyod kyi gsung ni don dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de slad ni rgyu des don mchis pa ste khyod kyi gsung ni don dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Therefore, for that reason, your speech is meaningful, your speech is not empty.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'bras bu don dang bcas pa'i chos ston pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'bras bu don dang bcas pa'i chos ston pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, teach the Dharma whose result is not empty.

original: ji lta bu zhe na //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na //
translated: What is it like?🔽It is said:

original: smras pa / brtson 'grus legs par brtsams pa bzhin //
analyzed: smras pa / brtson 'grus legs par brtsams pa bzhin //
translated: Like the proper exertion of striving.

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
translated: This is what the Blessed One said.

original: byis pa'i brtson 'grus kyis ni le lo skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byis pa'i brtson 'grus kyis ni le lo skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The striving of a fool gives rise to laziness.

original: shin tu brtsams ches pas ni rgod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shin tu brtsams ches pas ni rgod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Excessive striving gives rise to agitation.

original: de ltar mtha' gnyis spangs nas bar ma'i lam gyis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar mtha' gnyis spangs nas bar ma'i lam gyis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, abandoning the two extremes, one should strive with the middle way.

original: de ltar yang dag par brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus don dang ldan par 'gyur zhing nges par thar pa nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du rgyu de las gsung de ni don mchis pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang dag par brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus don dang ldan par 'gyur zhing nges par thar pa nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du rgyu de las gsung de ni don mchis pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, the effort that is correctly undertaken becomes meaningful and certainly becomes liberation. In the same way, from that cause, that speech is said to be meaningful.

original: de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gsung don dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gsung don dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin te /
translated: In this way, the two verses explain the nature of the result of meaningful speech.

original: dbye ba bcu gcig pa bshad pa ni gsung la bstod pa'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dbye ba bcu gcig pa bshad pa ni gsung la bstod pa'i bshad pa'o //
translated: The explanation of the eleven divisions is the explanation of the praise of speech.

original: gsung la bstod pa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o /
analyzed: gsung la bstod pa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation called Praise of Speech, the seventh chapter.

original: // / gsung gi don gang yin pa de ni bstan pa yin pas na gsung la bstod pa'i 'og tu bstan pa la bstod pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: // / gsung gi don gang yin pa de ni bstan pa yin pas na gsung la bstod pa'i 'og tu bstan pa la bstod pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: The meaning of speech is the teaching, therefore, after the praise of speech, the praise of the teaching should be explained.🔽The one path, the easy method,

original: bgrod pa gcig dang thabs bde dang // legs par 'brel dang nyes pa med //
analyzed: bgrod pa gcig dang thabs bde dang // legs par 'brel dang nyes pa med //
translated: the good connection, the absence of faults,

original: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //
analyzed: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //
translated: the virtue in the beginning, middle, and end,

original: khyod kyi bstan 'dra gzhan la med //
analyzed: khyod kyi bstan 'dra gzhan la med //
translated: your teaching is not like others.

original: bgrod pa gcig dang thabs bde dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la //
analyzed: bgrod pa gcig dang thabs bde dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la //
translated: and so on.

original: gang gis bgrod pas na bgrod pa ste bgrod pa ni lam mo //
analyzed: gang gis bgrod pas na bgrod pa ste bgrod pa ni lam mo //
translated: The path is that by which one goes, that is, it is that which is gone over.

original: gcig kyang yin la bgrod pa yang yin pas na bgrod pa gcig ste ;
analyzed: gcig kyang yin la bgrod pa yang yin pas na bgrod pa gcig ste ;
translated: It is the one vehicle because it is the one vehicle that is gone over.

original: bstan pa zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //🔽lta ba rnam par dag bya'i phyir //
analyzed: bstan pa zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro // lta ba rnam par dag bya'i phyir //
translated: It is the one path, as will be explained.

original: lam 'di las ni gzhan pa med //
analyzed: lam 'di las ni gzhan pa med //
translated: There is no other path for purifying the view.

original: ces mdo las bshad pa'o //
analyzed: ces mdo las bshad pa'o //
translated: This is explained in the sutra.

original: lam gcig kho na yin te //
analyzed: lam gcig kho na yin te //
translated: There is only one path,

original: dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa zhes bshad do //
translated: just as it is explained that there is only one teaching of the Tathagata.

original: yang na thar pa gcig pu kho na thob par bya ba'i phyir bgrod pa ni bgrod pa gcig pa'o //
analyzed: yang na thar pa gcig pu kho na thob par bya ba'i phyir bgrod pa ni bgrod pa gcig pa'o //
translated: Or, it is the one vehicle because it is gone over for the sake of attaining the one liberation.

original: gcig gis bgrod pa zhes pa ni drug pa'i bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: gcig gis bgrod pa zhes pa ni drug pa'i bsdu ba'o //
translated: The one vehicle is the sixth case, the genitive.

original: shing sha ba'i lo ma dang 'dra ba'i mdo las ji ltar gsungs pa ni chos gang zhig mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir yang dag par 'jug @151b pa de rnams nyid kyis mkhyen cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shing sha ba'i lo ma dang 'dra ba'i mdo las ji ltar gsungs pa ni chos gang zhig mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par byang chub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir yang dag par 'jug @151b pa de rnams nyid kyis mkhyen cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is known, fully awakened to, and explained by those who have entered into it for the sake of higher knowledge, complete awakening, and nirvana.

original: thabs bde zhes bya ba la thabs ni sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: thabs bde zhes bya ba la thabs ni sbyar ba'o //
translated: Easy means of practice.

original: gdungs pa la sogs pa'i dka' ba'i dka' thub dgag pa'i phyir thabs bde ba gang la yod pa de ni thabs bde ba ste /
analyzed: gdungs pa la sogs pa'i dka' ba'i dka' thub dgag pa'i phyir thabs bde ba gang la yod pa de ni thabs bde ba ste /
translated: In order to reject the difficult austerities of mortification, etc., it is the easy means of practice that is possessed by that bodhisattva.

original: bde ba dang ldan pas sems mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro zhes mdo'i tshig yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba dang ldan pas sems mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro zhes mdo'i tshig yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the sutra says, “The mind becomes concentrated through the possession of happiness.”

original: ji srid thar pa ma thob pa de srid du lha dang mi rnams kyi 'bras bu legs par 'brel ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa de ni legs par 'brel ba dan ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ji srid thar pa ma thob pa de srid du lha dang mi rnams kyi 'bras bu legs par 'brel ba'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa de ni legs par 'brel ba dan ldan pa'o //
translated: Possessing the connection with the result of gods and humans for as long as one does not attain liberation.

original: nyes pa ni skyon te /
analyzed: nyes pa ni skyon te /
translated: Fault is a defect.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir na nyes pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir na nyes pa med pa'o //
translated: Because it is free from the faults of attachment, etc., it is faultless.

original: thog ma ni thos pa'i dus dang / bar ma ni bsam pa'i dus dang / tha ma ni bsgom pa'i dus su dge ba ste /
analyzed: thog ma ni thos pa'i dus dang / bar ma ni bsam pa'i dus dang / tha ma ni bsgom pa'i dus su dge ba ste /
translated: It is virtuous in the beginning, middle, and end, virtuous at the time of listening, virtuous at the time of reflection, and virtuous at the time of cultivation.

original: mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with the characteristics of the high states and of definite goodness.

original: de'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba ni bstan pa'o //
translated: It is taught as virtuous in the beginning, middle, and end because it is the cause of that.

original: khyod kyi 'dra ba gzhan la med pa ni drang srong ser skya dang / pe lu ka dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bstan pa'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi 'dra ba gzhan la med pa ni drang srong ser skya dang / pe lu ka dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bstan pa'o //
translated: It is without equal, since it is taught by no one else, such as the sages Kapila, Pāṇini, and the Nirgranthas.

original: 'di la ni rnam pa thams cad du bsten pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: 'di la ni rnam pa thams cad du bsten pa'i rigs so //
translated: It is proper to rely on it in every way.

original: de bzhin du yang /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang /
translated: And also:

original: khyod kyi gzhung lugs de lta bu //
analyzed: khyod kyi gzhung lugs de lta bu //
translated: Your system is like that.

original: gcig tu phangs la chags lta bas //
analyzed: gcig tu phangs la chags lta bas //
translated: It is entirely to be cherished,

original: byis pa gal te smod bgyid na //
analyzed: byis pa gal te smod bgyid na //
translated: but if fools should criticize it,

original: lta dang 'dra ba'i dgra ma mchis //
analyzed: lta dang 'dra ba'i dgra ma mchis //
translated: there is no enemy like a view.

original: gcig tu phangs la zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: gcig tu phangs la zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o //
translated: The phrase in one way regrettable is an expansion.

original: de lta bu'i bgrod pa gcig pa la sogs pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bgrod pa gcig pa la sogs pa'i tshogs so //
translated: Such is the collection of the single vehicle, etc.

original: gcig tu phangs pa ni 'dod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcig tu phangs pa ni 'dod par bya ba'o //
translated: Regrettable means to be desired.

original: gcig tu phangs pa khyod kyi gzhung lugs zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcig tu phangs pa khyod kyi gzhung lugs zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Your doctrine is regrettable will be explained.

original: mu stegs pa ngan pa'i lta ba la chags pa ni lta ba la chags pa ste /
analyzed: mu stegs pa ngan pa'i lta ba la chags pa ni lta ba la chags pa ste /
translated: Attachment to the bad views of the tīrthikas is attachment to views.

original: lta ba la chags pa'i rgyur gyur pa des so //
analyzed: lta ba la chags pa'i rgyur gyur pa des so //
translated: By that, which becomes the cause of attachment to views, by that.

original: byis pa ni byis pa kho na'o //
analyzed: byis pa ni byis pa kho na'o //
translated: The child is just a child.

original: gzhung lugs ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhung lugs ni bstan pa'o //
translated: Doctrine is teaching.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i tshig go //
translated: If is a word for possibility.

original: smod pa ni smod par bgyid pa'o //
analyzed: smod pa ni smod par bgyid pa'o //
translated: Blame is to blame.

original: ma mchis pa ni ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: ma mchis pa ni ma mchis pa'o //
translated: Nonexistent is not existent.

original: lta ba dang 'dra ba ni lta ba dang 'dra ba'i dgra ste /
analyzed: lta ba dang 'dra ba ni lta ba dang 'dra ba'i dgra ste /
translated: Like a view is a view-like enemy.

original: lta ba kho na'o //
analyzed: lta ba kho na'o //
translated: It is just a view.

original: de rnams nyid kyi dgra'i mchog ste /
analyzed: de rnams nyid kyi dgra'i mchog ste /
translated: It is the supreme enemy of those very view-like enemies.

original: gang gis khyod kyi dge ba dang ldan pa'i bstan pa la byis pa de rnams sun 'byin par byed do zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis khyod kyi dge ba dang ldan pa'i bstan pa la byis pa de rnams sun 'byin par byed do zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the verse is clear.🔽The other verse says:

original: gzhan ni 'gro ba'i don slad du //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'gro ba'i don slad du //
translated: For the sake of the world’s welfare,

original: sdug bsngal mang bstar gang lags @152a * //🔽pa ; / de bsams khyod bstan ngan na yang //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mang bstar gang lags @152a * // pa ; / de bsams khyod bstan ngan na yang //
translated: you have endured much suffering.🔽Considering that, you should remain

original: gnas par bgyi ba la thug na //
analyzed: gnas par bgyi ba la thug na //
translated: in the teaching, even if it be a bad one.

original: bstar ba ni khyod kyis nyams su myong zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bstar ba ni khyod kyis nyams su myong zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: you have experienced it.

original: gzhan ni khyod kyis bstar ba lags //
analyzed: gzhan ni khyod kyis bstar ba lags //
translated: The other verse says:🔽You have endured it.

original: zhes brjod pa ni khyod kyis bstar ba lags zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes brjod pa ni khyod kyis bstar ba lags zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: you have endured it.

original: sdug bsngal gang zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //🔽don slad du zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyu mtshan gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gang zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro // don slad du zhes bya ba ni de'i rgyu mtshan gyi phyir ro //
translated: What suffering?

original: gang gi yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi yin zhe na /
translated: For the sake of what?

original: 'gro ba yi'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba yi'o //
translated: For the sake of the world.

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dmyal ba dang dud 'gro rnams kyi yang rnam pa du ma'i sdug bsngal mang po de ni sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dmyal ba dang dud 'gro rnams kyi yang rnam pa du ma'i sdug bsngal mang po de ni sdug bsngal ba'o //
translated: Suffering is from the generation of the Thought of Awakening up to Nirvana, and also the many kinds of suffering of the hells and animals.

original: bsam pa ni dran pa yis so //
analyzed: bsam pa ni dran pa yis so //
translated: The intention is by recollection.

original: ngan na yang zhes bya ba ni mi mdzes pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: ngan na yang zhes bya ba ni mi mdzes pa la yang ngo //
translated: Even if it is bad means even if it is ugly.

original: yang gi sgra ni mi srid pa yang ste /
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni mi srid pa yang ste /
translated: The word also means even if it is impossible.

original: shin tu nye bar zhi ba bstan to //🔽gnas par bgyi ba la thug na //
analyzed: shin tu nye bar zhi ba bstan to // gnas par bgyi ba la thug na //
translated: It shows complete peace.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnas par bya ba'i rigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnas par bya ba'i rigs so //
translated: Up to the point of abiding means it is proper to abide.

original: khyod kyi bstan pa ni khyod kyis gsungs pa'i cho ga la'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi bstan pa ni khyod kyis gsungs pa'i cho ga la'o //
translated: Your teaching is in the rite that you have taught.

original: bshad pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The explanation is this.

original: sman par mdzad pa'i phyir khyod kyi bstan pa ngan na yang byas pa gzo bas gnas pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: sman par mdzad pa'i phyir khyod kyi bstan pa ngan na yang byas pa gzo bas gnas pa'i rigs so //
translated: Because you are a doctor, even if your teaching is bad, it is proper to abide by it out of gratitude.

original: phan pa gsung zhing phan mdzad pa //
analyzed: phan pa gsung zhing phan mdzad pa //
translated: You speak for the benefit and do what is beneficial.

original: khyod kyi bstan pa ci smos te //
analyzed: khyod kyi bstan pa ci smos te //
translated: What need to mention your teaching?

original: mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang //
analyzed: mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang //
translated: Even if your head were on fire,

original: ci yi slad du sgrub mi bgyid //
analyzed: ci yi slad du sgrub mi bgyid //
translated: Why would you not practice?

original: phan pa mdzad pa ci smos te //🔽zhes bya ba smos pa la /
analyzed: phan pa mdzad pa ci smos te // zhes bya ba smos pa la /
translated: What need to speak of those who would help you?

original: ci smos te zhes bya bas ni the tshom med pa bstan te /
analyzed: ci smos te zhes bya bas ni the tshom med pa bstan te /
translated: Here, “what need to speak of” indicates certainty.

original: phan pa mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul gsal ba dang / gzhan gyi cha lugs 'dzin pa'i thabs kyis phan pa mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: phan pa mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul gsal ba dang / gzhan gyi cha lugs 'dzin pa'i thabs kyis phan pa mdzad pa'o //
translated: “Those who would help you” are those who help you by the method of manifesting miracles and taking on other forms.

original: phan pa gsung ba zhes bya ba ni phan pa bstan pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: phan pa gsung ba zhes bya ba ni phan pa bstan pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “Those who would teach you” are those who have the nature of teaching what is helpful.

original: bstan pa'i mtshan nyid ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: bstan pa'i mtshan nyid ni bshad zin to //
translated: The characteristics of a teacher have already been explained.

original: ci'i slad du zhes bya ba ni mi srid pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ci'i slad du zhes bya ba ni mi srid pa'i phyir te /
translated: “Why?” means “because it is impossible.”

original: rnam pa gzhan mi srid cing rnam pa gang zhig gis sgrub par mi bgyid pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan mi srid cing rnam pa gang zhig gis sgrub par mi bgyid pa yin pa'o //
translated: It is impossible that you would not practice in any other way.

original: mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang //
analyzed: mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang //
translated: Even if your head were on fire,

original: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo zhugs kyis 'bar bar gyur na yang mgo po tshig pa la btang snyoms byas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong bas khyod kyi bstan pa 'bras bu dang bcas par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo zhugs kyis 'bar bar gyur na yang mgo po tshig pa la btang snyoms byas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong bas khyod kyi bstan pa 'bras bu dang bcas par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intention is this: “Even if your head were to catch fire, you should remain indifferent to the burning of your head. You should see the four noble truths. You should make my teaching fruitful.”

original: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te /
translated: The Lord has said this:

original: dge slong dag mgo bo 'bar bar gyur pa la btang snyoms @152b su byas nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon du ma gyur pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus chen po'i chen pos ji srid sbyor ba'i bar du bya ba'i rigs so zhes🔽bya ba'o // de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa de rnams kyis rgyu gang gis bstan pa la 'jug pa de'i rgyu bshad nas /
analyzed: dge slong dag mgo bo 'bar bar gyur pa la btang snyoms @152b su byas nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon du ma gyur pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus chen po'i chen pos ji srid sbyor ba'i bar du bya ba'i rigs so zhes bya ba'o // de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa de rnams kyis rgyu gang gis bstan pa la 'jug pa de'i rgyu bshad nas /
translated: “Monks, you should remain indifferent to the burning of your head. You should apply great aspiration and great effort to manifest the four noble truths that have not been manifested, until you reach the point of application.”🔽Having explained the cause of engaging in the teaching with these verses,

original: bstan pa la 'jug pa'i phan yon bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: bstan pa la 'jug pa'i phan yon bshad par bya ste /
translated: the benefits of engaging in the teaching should be explained.

original: khyod kyi bstan pas rang dbang dang / byang chub bde dang zhi ba dang // khyod kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang // legs pa bzhi po 'di kun thob //
analyzed: khyod kyi bstan pas rang dbang dang / byang chub bde dang zhi ba dang // khyod kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang // legs pa bzhi po 'di kun thob //
translated: peace, and the praise of your good qualities.

original: rang dbang dang byang chub bde dang zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: rang dbang dang byang chub bde dang zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o //
translated: Self-mastery and the bliss of enlightenment are explained in detail.

original: rang dbang ni chos nyid de /
analyzed: rang dbang ni chos nyid de /
translated: Self-mastery is reality.

original: de thob pa zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de thob pa zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The attainment of that is explained below.

original: rang dbang ni rang dbang kho na ste /
analyzed: rang dbang ni rang dbang kho na ste /
translated: Self-mastery is self-mastery itself.

original: gzhan gyi dbang du ma gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang du ma gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means not being under the control of others.

original: bstan pa la brten nas sred pa spangs pa'i phyir bran du mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: bstan pa la brten nas sred pa spangs pa'i phyir bran du mi 'gyur te //
translated: One does not become a slave because of the teaching, since craving is abandoned.

original: sred pa ni bran gyi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: sred pa ni bran gyi rgyu yin no //
translated: Craving is the cause of slavery.

original: sred pa rtsa nas bcad pa na //
analyzed: sred pa rtsa nas bcad pa na //
translated: When craving is cut from the root,

original: dngos grub lag mthil thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos grub lag mthil thob par 'gyur //
translated: attainment is in the palm of the hand.

original: de la glags skabs med pa na //
analyzed: de la glags skabs med pa na //
translated: When there is no opportunity for it,

original: bran nyid mgo la gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: bran nyid mgo la gnas par 'gyur //
translated: slavery resides in the head.

original: zhes de bzhin du gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes de bzhin du gsungs so //
translated: It is taught in the same way.

original: byang chub ces bya ba la sdug bsngal ma lus pa bcom pa'i phyir byang chub kho na bde ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub ces bya ba la sdug bsngal ma lus pa bcom pa'i phyir byang chub kho na bde ba'o //
translated: “Enlightenment” is the very bliss of enlightenment, because it destroys all suffering without exception.

original: bsngags pa zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'o //
analyzed: bsngags pa zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'o //
translated: “Praise” means worship.

original: khyod kyi yon tan la bsngags pa byas pas ni khyod kyi yon tan la bsngags pa'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi yon tan la bsngags pa byas pas ni khyod kyi yon tan la bsngags pa'o //
translated: “Praise of your qualities” means praise of your qualities.

original: nga'i nyan thos shes rab dang ldan pa'i nang na sh'a ri'i bu ni lha'i mig tu gyur pas na mchog dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ni dge slong mood gal gyi bu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nga'i nyan thos shes rab dang ldan pa'i nang na sh'a ri'i bu ni lha'i mig tu gyur pas na mchog dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ni dge slong mood gal gyi bu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Among my śrāvakas, Śāriputra has the divine eye, so he is supreme. The monk Maudgalyāyana has the greatest magical power.”

original: de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis bstod par bya ba'i phyir zhi ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis bstod par bya ba'i phyir zhi ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: In order to praise such qualities, “peace” means nirvāṇa.

original: thob pa ni thob pa'o //
analyzed: thob pa ni thob pa'o //
translated: “Attainment” means obtaining.

original: ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is it?

original: legs pa bzhi po 'di kun te /
analyzed: legs pa bzhi po 'di kun te /
translated: All these four good things.

original: rang dbang la sogs pa legs pa bzhi po 'di kun thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rang dbang la sogs pa legs pa bzhi po 'di kun thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One obtains all these four good things, such as independence.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: khyod kyi bstan pa las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyod kyi bstan pa las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: from your teaching.

original: de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstan pa la 'jug pa'i phan yon bshad nas /
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstan pa la 'jug pa'i phan yon bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the benefit of engaging in the teaching with such a verse,

original: bstan pas bdud bzhi las rgyal ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: bstan pas bdud bzhi las rgyal ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: the victory over the four demons through the teaching should be explained.

original: dpa' bo khyod kyi bstan pa 'di //
analyzed: dpa' bo khyod kyi bstan pa 'di //
translated: This teaching of yours, O Hero,

original: mu stegs thams cad skrag mdzad la //
analyzed: mu stegs thams cad skrag mdzad la //
translated: terrifies all the tirthikas,

original: bdud ni sems khong chud mdzad cing //
analyzed: bdud ni sems khong chud mdzad cing //
translated: confuses the mind of Mara,

original: lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin //🔽mu @153a * //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin // mu @153a * //
translated: and gives relief to gods and men.

original: stegs thams cad skrag mdzad la //
analyzed: stegs thams cad skrag mdzad la //
translated: All the tirthikas are terrified

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: skrag par mdzad ces pa ni skrag pa'o //
analyzed: skrag par mdzad ces pa ni skrag pa'o //
translated: Terrifies means to frighten.

original: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The teaching will be explained.

original: nges par legs pa lhag par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni mu dang 'dra bas na mu'o //
analyzed: nges par legs pa lhag par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa ni mu dang 'dra bas na mu'o //
translated: The extremes are like the extremes of existence and non-existence. The path is the path to the supreme state. Engaging in it is extreme engagement.

original: de legs par brjod pas na mu stegs ni rdzogs byed la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de legs par brjod pas na mu stegs ni rdzogs byed la sogs pa'o //
translated: The tirthikas are the Nirgranthas and so on.

original: de dag thams cad skrag par mdzad pa ni bdag med pa nyid ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag thams cad skrag par mdzad pa ni bdag med pa nyid ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: All of them are frightened because he teaches selflessness.

original: gang gi phyir mu stegs pa de rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba stod par mi 'dod pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mu stegs pa de rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba stod par mi 'dod pa de'i phyir /
translated: Since he does not want to encourage the view of self of those tīrthikas,

original: chos kun bdag nyid med pa ste //
analyzed: chos kun bdag nyid med pa ste //
translated: he teaches, “All phenomena are devoid of self.”

original: zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pas skrag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pas skrag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, they are frightened by the Tathāgata’s teaching.

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ces bya ba de'i phyir bdag med pa bstan pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud ma lus pa las bstan pa rnam par rgyal bar gyur to zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ces bya ba de'i phyir bdag med pa bstan pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud ma lus pa las bstan pa rnam par rgyal bar gyur to zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Since all the afflictions arise from the conception of a self, he teaches selflessness. Thus, it is explained that he is completely victorious over the māra of the afflictions.

original: bdud ni lha'i bu'i bdud do //
analyzed: bdud ni lha'i bu'i bdud do //
translated: Māra is the māra of the gods.

original: de'i sems khong du chud par mdzad pa ni de'i yul las 'das par bstan pa'i phyir lha'i bu'i bdud las rgyal ba nyid bshad do //
analyzed: de'i sems khong du chud par mdzad pa ni de'i yul las 'das par bstan pa'i phyir lha'i bu'i bdud las rgyal ba nyid bshad do //
translated: He is called the “māra of the gods” because he is the son of a god. The phrase “he penetrates his mind” means that he teaches the transcendence of his domain. Thus, it is explained that he is victorious over the māra of the gods.

original: bden pa bstan pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa ni ma yin pas so //
analyzed: bden pa bstan pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa ni ma yin pas so //
translated: Since he is not frightened by the teaching of the truths, he is victorious over the māra of the lord of death.

original: lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin //
translated: You have also given relief to gods and men.

original: zhes pa ni mi rnams kyi yang tshe sbyin pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir phung po'i bdud las bstan pa rgyal ba nyid bshad do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mi rnams kyi yang tshe sbyin pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir phung po'i bdud las bstan pa rgyal ba nyid bshad do //
translated: This is explained as the victory over the Mara of the aggregates because it is the means of giving life to men.

original: khyod kyi 'di zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi 'di zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bshad pa'o //
translated: This of yours is as has been explained.

original: dpa' bo ni bod pa'o //🔽'chi bdag gi bdud las rgyal bar bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: dpa' bo ni bod pa'o // 'chi bdag gi bdud las rgyal bar bshad par bya ste /
translated: The hero is the teacher.🔽The victory over the Mara of Death is to be explained.

original: 'chi bdag bstan pa khams gsum gyi //
analyzed: 'chi bdag bstan pa khams gsum gyi //
translated: The Mara of Death is taught to be

original: sa chen dag la spyod bgyid pa //
analyzed: sa chen dag la spyod bgyid pa //
translated: the one who acts on the great domain of the three realms,

original: mi thogs bzlog pa ma mchis pa'ang //
analyzed: mi thogs bzlog pa ma mchis pa'ang //
translated: who is not obstructed and cannot be turned back.

original: khyod kyi bstan pas zil gyis mnan //
analyzed: khyod kyi bstan pas zil gyis mnan //
translated: He is overcome by your teaching.

original: khams gsum gyi sa chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa ni khams gsum mo //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi sa chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa ni khams gsum mo //
translated: The great domain of the three realms, etc. The desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm are the three realms.

original: de nyid kyi sa chen po ni yul chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi sa chen po ni yul chen po'o //
translated: The great domain of those is the great object.

original: de la spyod bgyid pa ni khams gsum gyis chen po gang la spyod bgyid pa'o //
analyzed: de la spyod bgyid pa ni khams gsum gyis chen po gang la spyod bgyid pa'o //
translated: The one who acts on that is the one who acts on the great domain of the three realms.

original: 'chi bdag gi bstan pa zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chi bdag gi bstan pa zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The teaching of the Lord of Death will be explained.

original: yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la yang mi thogs pa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir khyad par ma yin pa dang gsod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la yang mi thogs pa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir khyad par ma yin pa dang gsod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And even those who are virtuous are not free from it, meaning that they are not exempt from it, and that it is the killer.

original: bzlog @153b pa ma mchis pa ni lcags kyu med pa ste /
analyzed: bzlog @153b pa ma mchis pa ni lcags kyu med pa ste /
translated: Without a counteragent means without an antidote.

original: bzlog ma nus zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bzlog ma nus zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is impossible to turn it back, the meaning is that it cannot be turned back.

original: khyod kyi bstan pas zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi bstan pa'i lam gyis so //
analyzed: khyod kyi bstan pas zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi bstan pa'i lam gyis so //
translated: By your teaching means by the path of your teaching.

original: zil gyis mnan pa ni mthu dang bral bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: zil gyis mnan pa ni mthu dang bral bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: It overpowers means it robs of power.

original: 'chi bdag ces bya ba ni 'chi bdag gi'o //
analyzed: 'chi bdag ces bya ba ni 'chi bdag gi'o //
translated: The Lord of Death means of the Lord of Death.

original: bstan pa ni rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: bstan pa ni rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: The teaching means the engagement.

original: / de ltar gang las rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: / de ltar gang las rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: From what is it understood in this way?

original: bshad pa / khyod kyi bstan pa'i thugs 'tshal ba //
analyzed: bshad pa / khyod kyi bstan pa'i thugs 'tshal ba //
translated: It is said:

original: dga' na bskal par yang gnas la //
analyzed: dga' na bskal par yang gnas la //
translated: If you wish to live, you can live for an eon.

original: gang du bdud kyis mi brdzi ba //
analyzed: gang du bdud kyis mi brdzi ba //
translated: Where the demon cannot overpower you.

original: der yang dga' mgur rab tu mchi //
analyzed: der yang dga' mgur rab tu mchi //
translated: And there, too, I will be happy.

original: khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba //
analyzed: khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba //
translated: I have understood your teaching’s system.

original: zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi bstan pa'i tshul shes pas na khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi bstan pa'i tshul shes pas na khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba ste /
translated: The meaning is: “I have understood your teaching’s system through knowing your teaching’s method.”

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgoms pa'i mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgoms pa'i mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: “I have the power of having cultivated the bases of supernatural power.”

original: na ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: na ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “na” is “because.”

original: bskal par yang gnas la zhes bya ba ni lo mang po 'ba' zhig tu ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bskal par yang gnas la zhes bya ba ni lo mang po 'ba' zhig tu ma yin gyi /
translated: “I will remain for an eon” means not just for many years,

original: bskal par yang gnas te de ni yang dag par srid ces dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bskal par yang gnas te de ni yang dag par srid ces dgongs pa'o //
translated: but “I will remain for an eon,” thinking “That is possible.”

original: gang zhig kha cig gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi kun du bsnyen pa dang / bsgom pa dang / phu dud byed 'dod pa de ni bskal par gnas pa'am bskal pa las lhag par gnas pa zhes bya ba ni mdo'i tshig go //
analyzed: gang zhig kha cig gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi kun du bsnyen pa dang / bsgom pa dang / phu dud byed 'dod pa de ni bskal par gnas pa'am bskal pa las lhag par gnas pa zhes bya ba ni mdo'i tshig go //
translated: The sutra says, “Whoever wishes to cultivate, meditate on, and honor all four bases of supernatural power will remain for an eon or more than an eon.”

original: rab tu mchi zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu mchi zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'o //
translated: “I will go” means “I will go.”

original: der zhes bya ba ni phung po lhag ma med par mya ngan las 'das par ro //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni phung po lhag ma med par mya ngan las 'das par ro //
translated: There means in nirvana without remainder of the aggregates.

original: yang gi sgra ni yang gi don te //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni yang gi don te //
translated: The word “also” has the meaning of “and”.

original: der yang rab tu mchi zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: der yang rab tu mchi zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: “he also goes there”.

original: ci'i phyir der rab tu mchi zhe na //
analyzed: ci'i phyir der rab tu mchi zhe na //
translated: Why does he go there?

original: gang gi phyir de nyon mongs pas bcings pa las grol ba'i dga' mgu ni rang dbang ngo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de nyon mongs pas bcings pa las grol ba'i dga' mgu ni rang dbang ngo //
translated: Because he is delighted by the liberation of his bondage by the afflictions.

original: gang du zhe na //
analyzed: gang du zhe na //
translated: Where?

original: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa kho nar ro //
analyzed: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa kho nar ro //
translated: In nirvana without remainder of the aggregates.

original: bdud kyis mi brdzi ba zhes bya ba ni yul ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bdud kyis mi brdzi ba zhes bya ba ni yul ma yin pa'o //
translated: He is not oppressed by Mara means he is not an object.

original: gang gi phyir de lta bu yin pa de'i phyir na khams gsum gyi sa chen po zhes bya ba sngar sa chen po zhes bya ba'i snga ma'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don rigs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta bu yin pa de'i phyir na khams gsum gyi sa chen po zhes bya ba sngar sa chen po zhes bya ba'i snga ma'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don rigs so //
translated: Because it is so, therefore, the great stage of the three realms is the meaning of the previous verse beginning with “great stage”.

original: de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa de rnams kyis bdud bzhi las bstan pa rgyal bar mdzad pa kho na bshad do //
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa de rnams kyis bdud bzhi las bstan pa rgyal bar mdzad pa kho na bshad do //
translated: By those verses, he explains that he alone, the Victor, teaches the four Maras.

original: gzhan yang / lung gi don ni bsam pa dang // bsgom dang gus par mnyan pa yi //
analyzed: gzhan yang / lung gi don ni bsam pa dang // bsgom dang gus par mnyan pa yi //
translated: cultivation, and respectful listening.

original: dus gsum cha dbye khyod kyi ni //
analyzed: dus gsum cha dbye khyod kyi ni //
translated: You have divided the three times

original: bstan las gzhan la mchis ma lags //
analyzed: bstan las gzhan la mchis ma lags //
translated: in your teaching, but not in others.

original: lung gi don ni bsam pa dang // zhes bya ba ni @154a * //
analyzed: lung gi don ni bsam pa dang // zhes bya ba ni @154a * //
translated: The meaning of the scriptures is reflection,

original: rgyas pa'o // lung zhes bya ba ni gzhan las thos pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa'o // lung zhes bya ba ni gzhan las thos pa'o //
translated: This is the extensive explanation. The scriptures are what one hears from another.

original: don bsam pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: don bsam pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: Reflection on the meaning is the focus on logic.

original: bsgom pa ni ting nge 'dzin du bshad do //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni ting nge 'dzin du bshad do //
translated: Cultivation is explained as meditative concentration.

original: gus par mnyan pa ni rab tu sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: gus par mnyan pa ni rab tu sbyor ba ste /
translated: Respectful listening is application.

original: bsgom pa dang gus par mnyan pa de yi'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa dang gus par mnyan pa de yi'o //
translated: It is of that cultivation and respectful listening.

original: dang gi sgra ni lung dang don bsam pa yang ngo //
analyzed: dang gi sgra ni lung dang don bsam pa yang ngo //
translated: The word “and” means that it is also of the scriptures and reflection on the meaning.🔽You have divided the three times in your teaching, but not in others.

original: dus gsum cha dbye zhes bya ba ni re zhig dang por lung gi dus dang / de nas de'i don bsam pa'i dus dang / de nas bsgom pa la sbyor ba'i dus zhes bya ba ni dus gsum gyi cha dbye ba'o //
analyzed: dus gsum cha dbye zhes bya ba ni re zhig dang por lung gi dus dang / de nas de'i don bsam pa'i dus dang / de nas bsgom pa la sbyor ba'i dus zhes bya ba ni dus gsum gyi cha dbye ba'o //
translated: The division of the three times is as follows: First, the time of the scriptures, then the time of reflection on their meaning, and then the time of application to cultivation. This is the division of the three times.

original: gzhan la ma mchis pa ni gang du gzhan las she na /
analyzed: gzhan la ma mchis pa ni gang du gzhan las she na /
translated: What is not found elsewhere? It is not found in any other teaching.

original: khyod kyi bstan pa las so //
analyzed: khyod kyi bstan pa las so //
translated: In your teaching.

original: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa kho na la thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab rnams kyi bstan pa yod de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa kho na la thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab rnams kyi bstan pa yod de /
translated: In the teaching of the Buddha alone, there is the teaching of the wisdoms of hearing, reflection, and meditation.

original: gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is not found in any other teaching.

original: de lta bu ni tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bshad do //
analyzed: de lta bu ni tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bshad do //
translated: This is what is explained by this verse.🔽The suffering of not practicing the teaching should be explained.

original: bstan pa rjes su mi bsgrub pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de bshad par bya ste /🔽drang srong skyes mchog khyod kyi bstan //
analyzed: bstan pa rjes su mi bsgrub pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de bshad par bya ste / drang srong skyes mchog khyod kyi bstan //
translated: The verse says:🔽This is the teaching of the supreme sage,🔽so well-proclaimed,

original: de ltar legs par khyab 'di la //
analyzed: de ltar legs par khyab 'di la //
translated: what greater suffering could there be

original: mi gus gang lags de las ni //
analyzed: mi gus gang lags de las ni //
translated: than disrespect for it?🔽This is the teaching of the supreme sage,🔽so well-proclaimed,🔽what greater suffering could there be

original: sdug bsngal chen po 'ang ci zhig mchis //🔽de ltar legs par khyab 'di la //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: sdug bsngal chen po 'ang ci zhig mchis // de ltar legs par khyab 'di la // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: than not practicing it?🔽Here, so well-proclaimed refers to the verse on independence, etc.🔽This is the teaching of the supreme sage refers to the Buddha, the supreme sage.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rang dbang la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rang dbang la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bsdus pa'o //
translated: So well-proclaimed refers to the teaching of the three vehicles.🔽What greater suffering could there be than disrespect for it?

original: legs par khyab pa ni phan yon gyi tshogs kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: legs par khyab pa ni phan yon gyi tshogs kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the cause of the mass of benefits is the good spread of the teaching.

original: bstan pa legs par khyab pa ni nges par legs par yang dag par khyab pa zhes bya ba'i don te khyod kyi bstan pa de dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: bstan pa legs par khyab pa ni nges par legs par yang dag par khyab pa zhes bya ba'i don te khyod kyi bstan pa de dang sbyar ro //
translated: The good spread of the teaching is the meaning of the expression “well-spread good life.”

original: drang srong ni dgra bcom pa'o ;
analyzed: drang srong ni dgra bcom pa'o ;
translated: The sages are the Arhats.

original: / de rnams kyi skyes mchog ni 'dren pa dang gtso bo zhes bod pa'o //
analyzed: / de rnams kyi skyes mchog ni 'dren pa dang gtso bo zhes bod pa'o //
translated: The best of them are the leaders and the chief ones.

original: bstan pa ni sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: bstan pa ni sngar bshad zin to //
translated: The teaching has been explained above.

original: mi gus pa ni dad par mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi gus pa ni dad par mi byed pa'o //
translated: Lack of respect is lack of faith.

original: gang zhes bya ba ni gang gi don la yongs su spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba ni gang gi don la yongs su spyod pa'o //
translated: “What” is the object of enjoyment.

original: ci zhig ces bya ba ni srid par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig ces bya ba ni srid par brjod pa'o //
translated: “What” is the expression for existence.

original: sdug bsngal chen po'ang zhes bya ba ni shin tu rang don nyams pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sdug bsngal chen po'ang zhes bya ba ni shin tu rang don nyams pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Great suffering” means a great loss of one’s own welfare.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni mi gus pa las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni mi gus pa las so //
translated: “From that” means from lack of respect.

original: bshad pa'i don ni 'di yin te legs par khyab pa'i rgyud khyod kyi bstan pa la mi gus pa'i phyir phyi rol du lta ba rnams kyi rang gi don chen po nyams pa 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa'i don ni 'di yin te legs par khyab pa'i rgyud khyod kyi bstan pa la mi gus pa'i phyir phyi rol du lta ba rnams kyi rang gi don chen po nyams pa 'di nyid yin te /
translated: The meaning of the explanation is this: Because of your lack of respect for the teaching, this is the great loss of your own goal, of those who look outward, not another.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes @154b bstan pa la bstod pa'i bshad pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes @154b bstan pa la bstod pa'i bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the commentary on the praise of the teaching.

original: bstan pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o /
analyzed: bstan pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the eighth chapter, called the praise of the teaching.

original: // / smon lam la bstod pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon smon lam bzhes pa ste /
analyzed: // / smon lam la bstod pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon smon lam bzhes pa ste /
translated: The praise of the aspiration is the Bhagavat's previous aspiration.

original: mthong ngam thos sam dran par gyur pa'am //
analyzed: mthong ngam thos sam dran par gyur pa'am //
translated: Whether seen, heard, remembered,

original: reg gam brjod pa'i tshig gi nyer 'gro yang //
analyzed: reg gam brjod pa'i tshig gi nyer 'gro yang //
translated: or touched by the words of expression,

original: rnam pa thams cad 'gro la phan pa ni //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad 'gro la phan pa ni //
translated: may all beings be benefited

original: bde dang ldan pa shin tu byed par shog / ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: bde dang ldan pa shin tu byed par shog / ces bya ba'o //
translated: and become endowed with happiness.

original: de'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan par bya ste /
translated: Its result should be taught:

original: khyod thos pas ni spro ba skye //
analyzed: khyod thos pas ni spro ba skye //
translated: By hearing you, enthusiasm arises.

original: mthong bas dad pa skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mthong bas dad pa skye bar 'gyur //
translated: By seeing, faith arises.

original: khyod gsung thos pas dga' 'gyur te //
analyzed: khyod gsung thos pas dga' 'gyur te //
translated: You are delighted to hear his teaching,

original: bstan pas rnam par grol bar bgyid ;
analyzed: bstan pas rnam par grol bar bgyid ;
translated: and through the teaching, you are liberated.

original: / khyod thos pas ni spro ba skye //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa thos pa la zhes bya ba ni thos pa ste /
analyzed: / khyod thos pas ni spro ba skye // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa thos pa la zhes bya ba ni thos pa ste /
translated: You generate enthusiasm through hearing him,

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i dbyangs 'di'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i dbyangs 'di'o //
translated: “Hearing” means hearing the sound of the word “Buddha.”

original: spro ba skye ba ni mthong ba las mos pa bskyed par mdzad de /
analyzed: spro ba skye ba ni mthong ba las mos pa bskyed par mdzad de /
translated: “You generate enthusiasm through hearing him” means that you generate the aspiration through seeing him.

original: dper na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos pas dga' zhing ba spu ldang bas bstan pa la mos par gyur to //
analyzed: dper na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos pas dga' zhing ba spu ldang bas bstan pa la mos par gyur to //
translated: For example, the layman Anathapindada, hearing the sound of the word “Buddha,” which he had never heard before, was delighted and his hair stood on end.

original: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das thos pa tsam gyis der 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i smon lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan to //
analyzed: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das thos pa tsam gyis der 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i smon lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan to //
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One taught the prayer, “May I become like that through merely hearing the word,” and it was fulfilled.

original: nye bar phongs pa'i srog chags rnams tshim par mdzad pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang  ba skye par 'gyur ba ni dad pa skye bar mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: nye bar phongs pa'i srog chags rnams tshim par mdzad pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang  ba skye par 'gyur ba ni dad pa skye bar mdzad pa ste /
translated: Because of being the nature of satisfying living beings who are in need, etc., he is the one who generates faith.

original: mthong ba ni mngon sum du byed pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba ni mngon sum du byed pa'o //
translated: Seeing is making manifest.

original: de ltar mthong bas phan par mdzad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar mthong bas phan par mdzad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, seeing, he acts to benefit.

original: chos bstan pa'i gsung gis dga' bar 'gyur ba ni nyan pa po dga' ba bskyed par mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: chos bstan pa'i gsung gis dga' bar 'gyur ba ni nyan pa po dga' ba bskyed par mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: He is the one who delights by the speech of teaching the Dharma, which means he is the one who generates delight in the listener.

original: / de ltar 'phags pa nyan thos kyis yang dag par chos mnyan pas dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sems khrugs par 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur zhes pa ni mdo'i tshig go //
analyzed: / de ltar 'phags pa nyan thos kyis yang dag par chos mnyan pas dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sems khrugs par 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur zhes pa ni mdo'i tshig go //
translated: Thus, the noble disciple, by listening to the Dharma, generates delight, his mind becomes clear, and he becomes inclined toward nirvana. This is the meaning of the sutra passage.

original: rnam par grol bar bgyid pa ni nyon mongs pa'i zhags pa dag las so //
analyzed: rnam par grol bar bgyid pa ni nyon mongs pa'i zhags pa dag las so //
translated: He liberates is from the bonds of afflictions.

original: bstan pas zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam ma //
analyzed: bstan pas zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam ma //
translated: By teaching is the noble path.

original: gzhan yang / chos bstan pa ni med na yang //
analyzed: gzhan yang / chos bstan pa ni med na yang //
translated: Even if the teaching of the Dharma does not exist,

original: khyod kyi sras kyis mgu bar 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod kyi sras kyis mgu bar 'gyur //
translated: your son will be pleased.

original: 'phel bas skye dgu rnams kyang dga' //
analyzed: 'phel bas skye dgu rnams kyang dga' //
translated: And the people will rejoice in the increase.

original: gshegs pa ni phan 'dogs mdzad //
analyzed: gshegs pa ni phan 'dogs mdzad //
translated: When you go, you will benefit.

original: ldog pa na ni rgud par 'gyur //🔽khyod kyi @155a * //
analyzed: ldog pa na ni rgud par 'gyur // khyod kyi @155a * //
translated: When you return, there will be decline.

original: sras kyis mgu bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sras kyis mgu bar 'gyur //
translated: Your son will be pleased.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o //
translated: This is the extensive explanation.

original: sras ni lhums nas bltams pa ste /
analyzed: sras ni lhums nas bltams pa ste /
translated: The son is born from the womb.

original: des mgu bar 'gyur ba ni byang chub sems dpa' skyes zhes bya bas brgya byin la sogs pa rnams mgu ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des mgu bar 'gyur ba ni byang chub sems dpa' skyes zhes bya bas brgya byin la sogs pa rnams mgu ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He will be pleased by the birth of the Bodhisattva, because he generates joy in Sakra and so on.

original: yang na byang chub thob pa ni sras te//
analyzed: yang na byang chub thob pa ni sras te//
translated: Or else, the son is the attainment of enlightenment.

original: des kyang de bzhin du mthar bde ba grub par mdzad pas na mgu bar 'gyur ba ni byang chub sems dpas 'chi ba med pa lhag par rtogs par gyur to zhes bya bas ni brgya byin la sogs pa rnams mgu bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to
analyzed: des kyang de bzhin du mthar bde ba grub par mdzad pas na mgu bar 'gyur ba ni byang chub sems dpas 'chi ba med pa lhag par rtogs par gyur to zhes bya bas ni brgya byin la sogs pa rnams mgu bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to
translated: And he will be pleased by that, because he accomplishes the ultimate bliss in the same way. The Bodhisattva has realized immortality. This means that Sakra and so on are pleased.

original: // 'phel ba ni nyan thos pa mang po ste //
analyzed: // 'phel ba ni nyan thos pa mang po ste //
translated: The increase is the many disciples.

original: des skye dgu rnams kyang dga' ba ni 'jig rten pa rnams phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des skye dgu rnams kyang dga' ba ni 'jig rten pa rnams phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And the people are delighted, which means that he has brought about the perfection of the world.

original: dge slong dag nyan thos gsar du dag spyod yul la spyod pa na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye ba mang po la bde ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong dag nyan thos gsar du dag spyod yul la spyod pa na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye ba mang po la bde ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar gsungs pa'o //
translated: The monks, when the disciples are newly practicing the domain of practice, it is for the benefit of many people, for the happiness of many people, and so on, as it is said.

original: gshegs pa ni bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: gshegs pa ni bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa ste /
translated: The going is the going of the Blessed One.

original: des phan 'dogs mdzad pa ni phan pa thams cad mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: des phan 'dogs mdzad pa ni phan pa thams cad mdzad pa'o //
translated: By that, the benefit is all the benefit.

original: bcom ldan 'das spyod yul gyi grong du gshegs pa na sgang mtho ba dma' bar 'gyur ba dang / dma' mo mthon por 'gyur ba dang / long ba rnams kyis mig rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / 'on ba rnams kyis rna ba dang / lkugs pa rnams kyis tshig rnyed par gyur to zhes bya ba ni lung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das spyod yul gyi grong du gshegs pa na sgang mtho ba dma' bar 'gyur ba dang / dma' mo mthon por 'gyur ba dang / long ba rnams kyis mig rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / 'on ba rnams kyis rna ba dang / lkugs pa rnams kyis tshig rnyed par gyur to zhes bya ba ni lung ngo //
translated: When the Blessed One went to the village of the domain, the high became low, the low became high, the blind found eyes, the deaf found ears, and the mute found speech. This is the oral tradition.

original: ldog pa na ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na ste /
analyzed: ldog pa na ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na ste /
translated: When it is reversed, it is when the Bhagavat has passed into Parinirvana.

original: de rgud par gyur pa ni skye dgu rnams kyi rang gi don nyams pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rgud par gyur pa ni skye dgu rnams kyi rang gi don nyams pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When it is in decline, it is when the welfare of beings is in decline.🔽Moreover, it is said:

original: gzhan yang / bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad //
analyzed: gzhan yang / bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad //
translated: It takes away sin by its proclamation.

original: khyod dran pas ni rangs par 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod dran pas ni rangs par 'gyur //
translated: It is satisfied by the recollection of you.

original: btsal bas blo gros skye 'gyur te //
analyzed: btsal bas blo gros skye 'gyur te //
translated: It produces the intellect by its search.🔽It is purified by its thorough knowledge.

original: yongs su shes pas rnam par dag / bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad //
analyzed: yongs su shes pas rnam par dag / bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad //
translated: It takes away sin by its proclamation.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: In this verse,

original: bsgrags pa ni yon tan la bstod pa ste /
analyzed: bsgrags pa ni yon tan la bstod pa ste /
translated: proclamation is praise of the virtues.

original: des sdig pa 'phrog pas na sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: des sdig pa 'phrog pas na sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad pa zhes bya ste /
translated: It takes away sin, therefore it is said to take away sin.

original: yon tan da lta bu dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das yin pas na brjod pa ni zhar la brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan da lta bu dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das yin pas na brjod pa ni zhar la brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the Bhagavat has such virtues, the proclamation is an aside.

original: de lta bu'i gtam la sbyor ba nye bar 'gro ba phan par mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i gtam la sbyor ba nye bar 'gro ba phan par mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'o //
translated: The application to such talk is called the performance of benefit.

original: dran pa zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin @155b gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dran pa zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin @155b gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The so-called “mindfulness” is the Blessed One, the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One.

original: khyod ni khyod do //
analyzed: khyod ni khyod do //
translated: You are you.

original: rangs pa ni rangs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rangs pa ni rangs par mdzad pa'o //
translated: You delight in delighting.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa dran pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos pas don myur bar thob pa dang / chos myur du thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa'i rangs pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mdo'i tshig go //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa dran pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos pas don myur bar thob pa dang / chos myur du thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa'i rangs pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mdo'i tshig go //
translated: Thus, the noble disciple who is mindful of the aspects of the Tathagata quickly attains the goal, quickly attains the Dharma, and attains delight associated with the Tathagata. This is the meaning of the sutra passage.

original: de ltar rjes su dran pa rtogs pas phan pa mdzad pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar rjes su dran pa rtogs pas phan pa mdzad pa zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus, it is explained that the benefit is accomplished by realizing the mindfulness.

original: gzhan gnas skabs thams cad la yang ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bas 'gro ba la phan pa mdzad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: gzhan gnas skabs thams cad la yang ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bas 'gro ba la phan pa mdzad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang sbyar ro //
translated: The benefit to beings is accomplished by the Blessed One in all circumstances, as appropriate, by applying the same principle.

original: btsal bas zhes bya ba na ston pa kho na la btsal ba'o //
analyzed: btsal bas zhes bya ba na ston pa kho na la btsal ba'o //
translated: “By searching” means searching only in the Teacher.

original: ji ltar rab tu byung ba 'phar ba yis bram ze rigs gtsang ma la smras pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: ji ltar rab tu byung ba 'phar ba yis bram ze rigs gtsang ma la smras pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: said to the pure brahmin:

original: glang po'i nags su 'gro ba'i skyes bus glang po'i nags su zhugs pa na nags tshal chen po de ru glang po'i rkang rjes mthong nas kye ma'o glang po che gang gi 'di lta bu'i rkang rjes zhes nges par rtogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: glang po'i nags su 'gro ba'i skyes bus glang po'i nags su zhugs pa na nags tshal chen po de ru glang po'i rkang rjes mthong nas kye ma'o glang po che gang gi 'di lta bu'i rkang rjes zhes nges par rtogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
translated: “When a person who has entered the elephant forest sees the footprints of an elephant, he will know, ‘Oh! The footprints of an elephant are like this.’

original: kye mi'i cha lugs dang ldan pa la rkang pa bzhi med de /
analyzed: kye mi'i cha lugs dang ldan pa la rkang pa bzhi med de /
translated: Oh! One who has the appearance of a human does not have four legs.

original: gang gi de ltar gyur pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa goo ta ma dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bram ze'i tshig phrad kyi mdo las gsungs so //🔽de bzhin du btsal nas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis ston pa kho nar nges pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi de ltar gyur pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa goo ta ma dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bram ze'i tshig phrad kyi mdo las gsungs so // de bzhin du btsal nas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis ston pa kho nar nges pa ste /
translated: One who has such footprints is the Bhagavat, the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened Buddha Gautama.’

original: yongs su shes par bshad do //
analyzed: yongs su shes par bshad do //
translated: Thus, having searched, one should teach by following and reversing, and one should explain that it is ascertained.

original: shes nas dad pa rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes nas dad pa rnyed pa'i phyir ro //
